key_risks: Real estate market volatility impacting property valuations and rental income
Tenant defaults due to financial instability among tenants
Regulatory changes in property laws, tax laws, or environmental standards
Dependency on financial institutions for funding development projects
controversies: Potential conflicts of interest and related-party transactions
Scrutiny over environmental impact and sustainability practices
environmental_issues: Need to meet net-zero carbon emission goals by 2030
Pressure to secure green building certifications
social_issues: Adapting to changing tenant needs, such as flexible workspaces post-COVID-19
governance_issues: Conflicts of interest and related-party transactions requiring robust governance

sources.title: Dexus Reviews: What Is It Like to Work At Dexus? | Glassdoor
sources.snippet: Is Dexus a good company to work for? Dexus has an overall rating of 3.3 out of 5, based on over 92 reviews left anonymously by employees. 56% of employees would recommend working at Dexus to a friend and 29% have a positive outlook for the business. This rating has decreased by 2% over the last 12 months.
